text: dau che neah chaur anak teangpir tow chuob ke( hvie r aon) haey niyeayobrab ke tha pitabrakd nasa yeungokhnhom teangpir kuchea anak noam sar nei mcheasa robsa anak . dau che neah saum anak daohleng ambaur aisreael mk aoy yeungokhnhom vinh haey saum anak chhb thveutearounakamm puokke tiet tow . chea karpit nasa yeung ban neamk aoy anak nouv phosdo tang pi mcheasa robsa anak . haey saum sokh sa ndi pheap kaetmean champoh anaknea del ban daertam kar changaoulobangheanh nih
